name: ARBOR CREST
description: Combine the unique texture created with enhanced-loop construction and a softer-than-ever 100% BCF STAINMASTER Tactesse Nylon fiber and you have the best of all worlds in Arbor Crest. Choose from 15 essential colors and expect premium performance.

name: ARTESSA
description: This stately carpet adds a bold new curve to bedrooms and formal settings. A contemporary cut and loop style that features the softness of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, this carpet will comfort and complement your home in 24 stunning colors.

name: AZURE
description: The sculptural quality of this elegant carpet is expressed in the graceful interplay between the cut and loop yarns. Choose from 24 superb colors of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, a fiber known for impressive softness and durability.

name: BALLETTO
description: Balletto uses cut and loop technology which exhibits a total twist within each loop creating a chiseled appearance. Crafted for perfection of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, the twenty-five colors span the spectrum of organic tones and are capable of complementing any room in your home.

name: BENOVIA
description: Crafted from 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, Benovia offers lasting durability and unmatched elegance. The cut and loop technique creates a wave like pattern that looks stunning in each of the twenty-five colors of nature inspired hues.

name: BERNINI
description: Make a bold statement with this exciting carpet's lush botanical pattern. The large scale design works beautifully with contemporary or transitional interiors, particularly when other natural products, such as stone and ceramic, are included as design elements. This carpet is available in 35 colors, including earth tones and mossy greens, and it is fashioned of 100% STAINMASTER Xtra Life Tactesse nylon for softness.

name: BISHOP SQUARE
description: Sleek and sophisticated, this low-profile grid pattern sets the stage for contemporary lifestyles. A perfect choice for game rooms, media rooms, or any active area of your home, this carpet is available in 21 tonal colorways of 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II BCF nylon.

name: BOLLINGER
description: Bollinger is a soothing and comforting loop carpet made of 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF nylon.  A durable carpet capable of withstanding everyday use, Bollinger offers a selection of 20 earth tone colors to enhance the elegance of your home.

name: BONTERRA
description: A fashion forward palette of 30 rich colors makes up this plush and delightfully textured carpet.  Crafted from 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF nylon, Bonterra comforts your home and offers durability and beauty that will last for years.

name: BOTTICELLI
description: A pattern of swirling acanthus leaves gives this elegant carpet a distinctly European pedigree. The intricately executed cut and loop adds drama and visual depth. Perfect for formal areas, or anywhere a sense of grandeur is desired. Fashioned of 100% STAINMASTER Xtra Life Tactesse BCF nylon, this carpet will deliver years of lasting beauty. Available in 35 colors.

name: BROOKWOOD PARK
description: Color your world with this versatile style that exemplifies one of todays best textured looks. This cut and loop pattern, made of 100% STAINMASTER Extrabody II BCF nylon, is designed to hold its good looks and tailored styling for years to come. Available in a rich diversity of 20 desirable colors.

name: CABRINI
description: Cabrini is versatile enough to warm any interior space in your home. It's made of 100% Stainmaster Tactesee BCF nylon and is available in 12 inviting neutral colorways. It is durable, yet comfortable.

name: CAYMUS
description: Delicate tendrils strewn across a richly textured field give this elegant carpet a captivating feeling of grace and movement. Made with the foot-cradling softness of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, this beautiful carpet is available in 24 nuanced shades.

name: COLUMBIA CREST
description: Columbia Crest displays a striated pattern that conveys an air of sophistication and comfort in a durable cut/loop design. With a strong range of neutral colors mixed with slate greys and blues, the color palette is subtle and compatible with today's interiors.

name: CORNUCOPIA
description: Graceful swirls of vine and leaf invoke a return to romance. Available in 30 highly desirable colorways, from warm earthtones to mossy greens, this luxurious carpet is constructed of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse nylon for beauty that will last and last.

name: CORSICA
description: This lush, textured cut pile carpet creates an atmosphere of luxury and quiet calm. This perennial favorite is softer than ever, thanks to 100% Stainmaster Tactesse BCF nylon. Available in 36 colors, including several dramatic, deeply saturated shades.

name: CORTEZ
description: A versatile carpet that offers the luxurious hand and generous pile depth of a Saxony velvet with the built-in ease of today's cut and loop designs. The distinctive color blended yarn produces a softly shimmering finish that adds light and openness to your room. With 30 color options to choose from, this beautiful carpet is the perfect choice for family rooms, home theaters, and bedrooms. Constructed of 100% STAINMASTER Xtra Life Tactesse nylon that will hold its beauty for years to come.

name: DEVON PLACE
description: Traced with a pattern of delicate vines, this graceful carpet has a delightful feminine touch. In 24 colors ranging from palest parchment to deep Merlot, this carpet has a look that's right for any room in your home. Made of 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II nylon.

name: ELAN
description: Elan is a new entry into the pattern market designed to offer the value today's savvy consumer is looking for. Elan offers a new twist to pattern categories that are classics with proven success. Featured in 20 high fashion colors, Elan is constructed of 100% Stainmaster ExtraBody II for a combination of value and performance.

name: ELLSWORTH
description: A tasteful design scaled to fit every room, cut pile lattice work frames intersecting squares of loop, in a look reminiscent of hand-knotted chenille. 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon assures durability, in a soft, inviting carpet that will bring warmth and comfort to your home. Available in 30 colors.

name: FONSECA
description: Fonseca enters the market designed to provide quality and value for today's savvy consumer. The pattern offers a new twist on a classic pattern category that continues to be successful. Featured in 20 high fashion colors, Fonseca is constructed of 100% BCF Stainmaster Tactesse nylon for a combination of excellent value and high performance.

name: GALLERON
description: Put a frame on fashion that is as practical as it is pretty. This cheerful trellis pattern offers clean, balanced lines, and a generous scale that suits settings small or large. A classic look in 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse nylon, this carpet comes in 24 versatile colors.

name: GRAND TRADITION
description: Grand Tradition creates a look of elegance while serving up all of today's most sought after performance attributes. Constructed of 100% BCF STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, this easy care broadloom is available in 20 solid and five fleck colorways.

name: HANDLEY
description: A tribute to simplicity and casual elegance, this patterned selection will fit effortlessly into any room or interior scheme. Environmentally friendly, soft, and durable, Handley is made of 100% DuraSilk PET Polyester and available in 32 colors.

name: HARRINGTON HALL
description: The graceful formality of the classic trellis pattern is updated here in this versatile cut and loop carpet. From the most traditional interiors to contemporary design schemes, this 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II nylon carpet will keep its good looks for years to come. Available in 24 colors.

name: HIGH SOCIETY
description: This aristocratic style features two tones of yarn that create stunning contrast and visual depth.  Graceful vines curl throughout this charming cut and loop design, which is made of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon and comes in 24 colors.

name: LE GRAND
description: This small pattern creates serenity and balance throughout your home. Short, trim pile in a cut and loop trellis pattern is easy to care for, soft, and durable in 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon. 24 fashion colors go from bedroom to living room or den with equal ease.

name: LOGAN POINT
description: Good looks, comfort, and easy-care durability  this carpet offers the best of everything for your home. A rough-and-tumble loop construction that's perfect for kid's activities, in a sophisticated, woven-sisal look that is definitely all grown up. Made of 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II nylon and available in 18 handsome colors.

name: LORETO
description: More than just glamorous, Loreto is soft as well. With a luxurious solid color cut pile texture and an ample selection of 32 tempting colors, the 100% Stainmaster Tactesse BCF nylon makes for a carpet that possesses comfort under foot and lasting beauty over time.

name: MANCHESTER
description: This pretty and pleasing multilevel loop diamond pattern has demure charm to grace any room in your home. For bedrooms or halls, formal living areas or even a sunroom or study, this classic style offers continuity and timeless good looks. 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon means this carpet will be soft as well as durable.  Available in 24 of today's best colors.

name: MARQUETTE
description: Nothing can match the sensual allure of a deep, plush, carpet, and this lavish friez holds its own in comfort, luxury, and color. Available in 18 beautiful shades of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon.

name: MARTELLA
description: With a palette of 32 sought-after colors and a lightly dotted pattern, Martella makes a tasteful statement. Composed of 100% DuraSilk PET Polyester, it's the earth-conscious choice.

name: MAXIMUM EFFECT
description: Combining the soft hand of 100% Stainmaster Luxerell BCF nylon and lasting durability, Maximum Effect works hard to make life easy. An excellent choice for a variety of interior styles and spaces, this broadloom is available in 18 colorways.

name: MENTON
description: Enjoy the versatility of this engaging carpet style that offers a fresh take on casual luxury. The short, dense textured pile provides easy-care simplicity, while the 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon keeps things on the softer side. Available in 24 popular colors.

name: MILLBROOK CROSSING
description: With its small-scale grid pattern and solid field of color, this style offers textural interest, while visually uniting the various design elements within a room. Made of 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II nylon and offered in 24 desirable fashion colors, this handsome carpet will add lasting beauty to your home.

name: MOVADO
description: Delicate vines meander throughout this gracious cut/uncut design. A large scale design with plenty of visual impact; it is understated enough not to compete with busy wall covering or upholstery fabrics. Available in 30 colors, including organic greens and earth tones that will enhance the natural beauty of the leaf motif. Constructed of 100% soft and durable STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon.

name: NANTUCKET
description: Inspired by Native American craftsmanship, this classic cut and loop basket weave design is small in scale, but will attract lots of attention. 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse nylon will accommodate today's active lifestyles, in 30 earth-inspired colors.

name: NORTH OAKS
description: Great colors and exciting textural effects give this carpet universal appeal. The stylish boucl finish and built-in protection of STAINMASTER Extrabody BCF nlyon make this style the perfect choice for rooms destined for active use. In 20 colors, including some of todays best neutrals.

name: ODETTE POINT
description: Precise patterning and rich colors give this enhanced loop carpet a sense of ordered style. Engineered for excellence, this 100% BCF STAINMASTER ExtraBody II Nylon product will withstand the tests of traffic and time. Odette Point has a selection of 12 colors.

name: PEDEMONTE
description: This high-energy, contemporary design sizzles with excitement. The abstract cut and loop grid pattern lends edgy contrast to the solid color pile, in this stylish solution for active areas throughout your home. Made of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, this carpet will stand up to years of wear and still stay soft and beautiful. Available in 24 colors.

name: PEGASUS BAY
description: The life of contemporary luxury is emulated in this patterned broadloom. Raised-texture, sizeable diamond patterns create space-expanding dimension in a softly stated manner. Featuring the easy-care softness of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF Nylon, Pegasus Bay is available in 25 colors.

name: PENLEY ESTATES
description: Smooth, soft, and classically simple, the plush construction of Penley Estates provides a clean line and luxurious backdrop for endless interior design options. Available in 36 colors, this 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF Nylon ensures effortless upkeep and long lasting beauty.

name: PRIVATE SELECTION
description: Private Selection creates a look of elegance while serving up all of today's most sought after performance attributes. Constructed of 100% Stainmaster Luxerell BCF nylon, this easy care broadloom is available in 20 solid and five fleck colorways.

name: RADFORD
description: With a deluxe full-handed feel, Radford puts a distinctive signature on any room in the home. The neutral color line coupled with the intriguing element of a contrasting barber pole, creates a casual ambience along with lasting performance. Radford is constructed of 100% Durasilk  PET polyester and is available in 12 colors.

name: RENDEZVOUS
description: Relax and live easy with this comfortable, carefree carpet. The upbeat pattern shows natural good looks, and the flecked surface hides soil that may accumulate between vacuumings. Deep, soft pile means year-round comfort for family rooms, game rooms, or casual living areas throughout your home. In 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II BCF nylon and 15 exciting colorways.

name: RISTOW
description: This stately carpet adds a bold new curve to bedrooms and formal settings. A desirable cut and loop style that features the softness of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse nylon, this carpet will comfort and complement your home in 24 stunning colors.

name: RIVER RUN
description: River Run creates a casually elegant impression and engages every room in your home. Constructed of 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF nylon, this easy to use cut pile carpet combines a soft soothing feel with a lasting durability and is available in 20 heathered colors.

name: SANTERRA
description: This well-bred style brings a regal touch to living rooms, dining rooms, and more. Cut-pile diamonds accented with loop boutonnires a smooth, classic look, made even more appealing with the addition of pattern and texture. Crafted of 100% STAINMASTER Xtra Life Tactesse nylon in 25 colors.

name: SHAFER POINT
description: Named for the overlook that exhibits some of the most pristine natural sculptures of the West, Shafer Point is a soft and comfortable cut/loop design crafted from 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon. The 24 western inspired colors offer your home a relaxing ambience and provide an oasis from the accelerated pace of daily life.

name: SOLENA
description: Infusing a sense of carefree days touring wine country vineyards in the warm sun, Solena is soft to the touch and invigorating to the eye. Straight lined patterns interrupted with multi-levels of texture make up this 100% BCF STAINMASTER Tactesse product available in 24 natural colors.

name: SPINNAKER
description: This cheerful style combines the velvety texture of cut pile with the practicality of loop, creating the perfect carpet for any room in your home. Made with the softness of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, this style is available in a comprehensive collection of 36 colors.

name: STONEGATE
description: This plush cut-and-loop design, with just the suggestion of a herringbone pattern, offers comfort as well as style and practicality. In 24 colors that include soft greens, Merlot, and a selection of new neutrals, this style makes a perfect cornerstone to build your room around. 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II BCF nylon for durability and softness.

name: TAMARISK
description: A contemporary classic, this abstract geometric carpet generates energy and excitement. The solid-color cut and loop pile lends visual unity to any room in your home. Featuring the easy-care softness of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, this versatile style is available in 24 current colors.

name: TANGER PEAK
description: These diamonds are practical as well as pretty. This cheerful trellis loop pattern offers clean, balanced lines, and a moderate scale that suits settings small or large. A classic look in 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II BCF nylon, this carpet comes in 15 versatile colors.

name: TEMPTING
description: A dramatic style that delivers impact, but is subtle enough to complement other design elements, in a large scale pattern that will enhance transitional and contemporary settings equally well. This innovative product is fashioned of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse nylon, and is available in 30 colors.

name: TRADE WINDS
description: Whether brightening a great room floor or anchoring a library's dcor, Trade Winds ensures smooth transitions and long lasting enjoyment. A precision cut/uncut construction and 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II BCF nylon add texture, a soft hand and unbeatable performance. Available in 28 popular colorways.

name: TROPEA
description: This romantic style has the classic striated effects found in traditional handmade carpets. Tonal color variances combined with high and low-luster cut and loop yarns create a pleasing, watercolor effect. Available in 24 colors of 100% Stainmaster Tactesse BCF nylon.

name: VALENTI II
description: The simplicity of this pleasing cut and loop design has true go-anywhere versatility. Made of 100% STAINMASTER Xtra Life Tactesse nylon, this carpet has the softness you want, with the stain resistance and ease of maintenance you need. 40 available color options make choosing easy. From formal dining areas to playrooms and dens, this carpet has your answers  it's that simple

name: WHISPER RIDGE
description: This carpet offers ultimate durability and simple, all-around style. A solid-color cut and loop texture available in 12 colors of 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II BCF nylon, this carpet offers comfort and long-wearing good looks for your home.

name: WHITEHAVEN
description: Combining the buttery-soft texture of 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF Nylon fiber and long-lasting durability, Whitehaven features a smooth, low profile with high appeal. This versatile cut loop product is available in 36 colors.

name: WISHING TREE
description: The name invites hopeful contemplation in the quiet of nature where decorating dreams do come true. Expand your interior's magnificence with this high-texture, easy-care friez. Wishing Tree is available in 30 colors and constructed of 100% Durasilk PET Polyester.

name: ARCHERY SUMMIT
description: This delightfully textured and durable friez is right on target for today's contemporary interiors. Easy to care for and soft to the touch, Archery Summit is available in 30 colors and constructed of 100% BCF Durasilk PET Polyester.

name: BLUEPRINT
description: Blueprint defines your plan for floor covering mastery. With a versatile 30 color pallet, this fabulous friez is as soft as it is forgiving. Created of 100% BCF Durasilk PET Polyester, this product is both beautiful and earth friendly.

name: CANOE RIDGE
description: Canoe Ridge takes you back to nature with its subtle ribbed pattern, bringing to mind elements of the forest. Choose from eighteen earth inspired color ways featuring 6 colors that utilize a fleck accent yarn that creates an added dimension to the carpet. Canoe Ridge is constructed using 100% STAINMASTER BCF nylon.

name: BRYAN PARK
description: Bryan Park celebrates a truly American style where the home is central to family life.  It creates the foundation for comfort and a casual ease.  Bryan Parks wide-ranging color line mimics the country landscape and is manufactured using 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon.  Select from 30 accomplished colors.

name: LANGHAM
description: Simple yet casual, Langhams  multi-color combinations offer exceptional styling and will work in any room or interior space.  Langham is made of 100% STAINMASTER BCF nylon and is available in twenty-four versatile colors.

name: CHARLESTON PLACE
description: With its small scale diamond pattern and tonal color play, Charleston Place is a charming carpet that exhibits style and textural interest. Made of 100% STAINMASTER BCF nylon, this carpet offers comfort and durability and is available in 15 shades of sunbaked neutrals.

name: GATESBURY
description: Gatesbury defines casual comfort for homes with discriminating taste. Combining dull and lustrous yarns, it offers 24 earthen colorways. Gatesbury is made of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, and the feel is ultra soft.

name: UNENDING
description: Unending is a smooth, soft and classic dense cut pile carpet that creates an atmosphere of luxury and casual elegance.  It is manufactured using 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF nylon and has an infinitely soft hand in combination with superior performance.  Available in 30 perfect colors.

name: R & R
description: R & R is the epitome of a relaxed lifestyle. Leisurely and restful by its style and softness, R & R soothes the senses from the outside world. Available in sixteen calming colorways, R & R is made from 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell BCF nylon.

name: TAITTINGER
description: Taittinger is a luxurious free form style that is Dixie Homes latest endeavor. The undulating wave-like pattern is formed by varying color and texture applications. Taittinger is made of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon and is available in 24 current colors with an eye toward future trends.

name: ECHELON
description: Inspired by compositions found in nature, Echelon complements todays well appointed interiors. As designers utilize natural elements such as wood, stone and distressed metals, Echelon is the perfect counterpart for the floor. Constructed of 100% STAINMASTER Tactesse BCF nylon, and available in 24 distinctive and relevant color ways.

name: HEATHERFIELD
description: Landscapes of rolling countryside inspired the style Heatherfield.  The carpet has a universal appeal with its heathered combination of yarns that create a random subtle effect.  This cut pile carpet is incredibly soft and is constructed of 100% STAINMASTER Luxerell fiber.  It is designed to hold its good looks and styling for  years to come.  Available in 12 heathered natural hues.

name: NATURE'S FIELD
description: Natures Field is perfect for todays casual environments. Its woven sisal-like texture is a great foundation on which to create beautiful interior spaces. Natures Fields palette of 24 colors provides a wide range of design choices. It is constructed of 100% STAINMASTER ExtraBody II nylon which ensures durability and exceptional performance.

name: EPIC
description: Epic is a traditional cut pile carpet that offers durability and comfort underfoot. It is constructed using Stainmasters new premium solution dyed BCF nylon which offers outstanding fade resistance, superlative stain resistance and excellent colorfastness.  It is  available in 8 versatile colors.

name: DELIGHT
description: Combine outstanding stain and soil resistance with comfort and good looks and you have Delight.  An excellent choice for any interior setting, this cut pile carpet is constructed using 100% STAINMASTER Solution Dyed BCF nylon 6,6 and is available in 15 top notch colors.

name: COZY
description: Cozy exhibits the best for your home - softness, comfort, and durability. Manufactured using Stainmasters new premium solution dyed BCF nylon 6,6 which features outstanding fade resistance, exceptional stain resistance and excellent colorfastness, Cozy is available in 15 first-class colors.

name: LINKED
description: New from Dixie Home is Linked.  With interlocking elements that form a cobblestone-like pattern, Linked is a small scale textured pattern for casual and transitional areas in the home. It is made of 100% Durasilk P.E.T. Polyester which gives it superior softness and durable performance and is available in 12 versatile colors.

name: SYMMETRIC
description: Symmetric is defined as beauty of form arising from balanced proportions. As the great architects of the 21st century employ architectural order throughout a building, Symmetric brings a sense of balance and tranquility to the home.  It is made of 100% Durasilk P.E.T. Polyester and is available in 12 placid colors.

name: SUMPTUOUS
description: An impressively deep and densely textured cut pile carpet, Sumptuous reflects a lifestyle of splendid elegance.  Constructed using 100% Durasilk P.E.T. Polyester, Sumptuous is an outstanding value and is available in 15 beautiful colorways.

name: DELANO
description:
Delano is a versatile cut / loop patterned product that is available in 12 natural colors a combination of solids and tweeds. It is constructed using Stainmasters new premium solution dyed BCF nylon 6,6 which offers the following features:

  • - Outstanding fade resistance
  • - Superlative stain resistance
  • - Excellent colorfastness

name: ALCOVA
description:
Alcova is a versatile cut / loop patterned product that is available in 12 natural colors a combination of solids and tweeds. It is constructed using Stainmasters new premium solution dyed BCF nylon 6,6 which offers the following features:

  • - Outstanding fade resistance
  • - Superlative stain resistance
  • - Excellent colorfastness

name: MILLPORT
description:
Millport is a versatile cut / loop patterned product that is available in 12 natural colors a combination of solids and tweeds. It is constructed using Stainmasters new premium solution dyed BCF nylon 6,6 which offers the following features:

  • - Outstanding fade resistance
  • - Superlative stain resistance
  • - Excellent colorfastness
